mxCell.value:
Transformers      
  (Human design Define Phase )

GPT-3 has 
a vocabulary size of
50,257 unique tokens
How Many GPT3 Parameters are calculated

Embedding Layer
Token -> Vectorize

向量，空间，特征
Embedding : 把token 映射到新的数学空间

GPT3 has a dimension number of 10288  - *d-model 
Each token is represented by a vector of 12,288 dimensions
[vocab_size, embedding_dim] = [50257, 12288]
50257 × 12288 = 617,173,056 parameters
词元化
Token Embedding: V × d_model = 50,257 × 12,288 ≈ 618M
Parameters are the learnable weights of the model — the values the model adjusts during training to reduce error and improve performance.

GPT-3 is a transformer decode-only Model. The total parameter count depends on:

1. Embedding Layer

2. Transform blocks (with Self - attention and feedforward layers

3. Output Project Layers( Often tied with embedding layers
With Transformer

位置编码 - 语义受位置影响:
Cats chase a dog
Dogs chase a cat

GPT 3 has a  maximum number of tokens input  as 2024-   A container with 2024 slot , L 

Positional Encoding Params Matrix:                               L(2024)* d-model (12288)   = 24,870,912 -- Assign one positional vector to each token position
Decoder Only

Masked Multi-head Self-Attention Layers:
1.allows the model to focus on important words
2.some heads tends to gather attention around central or topic related words
3.Masked ->Postion i can only attend to position <=j

Feedforward Neural Networks(FNN):
1. A 2-layer NN -> each position
FFN(x)=ReLU(xW1​+b1​)W2​+b2​
2. Add non-linearity and help transform beyond attention

Encoder: Analysis task e.g. Vector similarity;
Decoder: Output
Input → ⬇️ LayerNorm ⬇️ Masked Multi-Head Self-Attention ➕ Residual Connection ⬇️ LayerNorm ⬇️ Feedforward Neural Network (FFN) ➕ Residual Connection Output
➕ Residual Connections + LayerNorm                                           Help stabilize training; Preserve gradients and prevent degradation over many layers

GPT 3 - 96 stacked transformer layers Params:
1. Self - attention Parameters 
Self attention Q,K,V Projections: 3 x (d - model * d - model)
Output projection : 1 x (d - model * d - model) 

Attention Params = 4 * d-model * d- model = 4 * 12,288 * 12,288 = 603,979,776

2. FFN Parameters 
- First Linear Layer : d - model * d_ff
- Second Linear Layer : d_ff 

FFN params = 2 *d-model * d_ff = 2 * 12,288 * 49,152 = 1,208,231,936

3. Total Per Transformation Layer 
Total per layer=Attention+FFN=604M+1.21B=1.814B

4. Multiply by 96 Layers


Total for 96 layers=96×1.814B=174.144B\text{Total for 96 layers} = 96 \times 1.814B = 174.144BTotal for 96 layers=96×1.814B=174.144B

✅ ≈ 174.1 billion parameters just from the stacked transformer blocks
<font style="font-size: 20px;">X 96 Layers</font>
